orbotix.sphero
Class SensorControl

java.lang.Object
  orbotix.sphero.SensorControl

public class SensorControl
extends java.lang.Object

Control Sensor Data Streaming from Orbotix Robot

  • Orientation - Quaternion
  • Orientation - Euler (roll, pitch, yaw)
  • Accelerometer
  • Gyro
  • Location
  • Velocity

setRate

public void setRate(int hz)
Sets the streaming rate for all listeners. If already streaming, updates the rate and logs a warning.
